content: really sweet and deceptively simple to make with clear instructions on how to assemble suitable for advanced beginner 3 page written pattern although this is primarily a keychain it can be made into a toy by increasing wpi to recreate this toy in aran use a 4 mm hook and increase wool amount by 60% to recreate this toy in chunky use a 5 mm hook and increase wool amount by 200% © 2022 teri hamilton crochet at teri s this pattern is my original pattern by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission it is for personal use only it is permitted to make items from this pattern to sell for charitable purposes provided they meet safety guidelines and crochet at teri s is accredited
